title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 133.16 - Office of Administrative Hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 133.16 - Office of Administrative Hearings

State Regulations

There is hereby established within the Office of Cannabis

Management an Office of Administrative Hearings which shall conduct all
adjudicatory proceedings which devolve upon the board by requirement of
statute. All adjudicatory proceedings shall be conducted by the Office of

Administrative Hearings through the service of administrative law judges who
will have all the power and authority of presiding officers or hearing officers
as defined by the State Administrative Procedure Act, and other pertinent
statutes, and these regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
133.16

Adopted

New

York State Register December 31, 2024/Volume XLVII, Issue 53, eff. 12/31/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
